subdisciplines.name: Epigraphy
subdisciplines.description: The study of inscriptions or epigraphs as writing; it is the science of identifying graphemes, clarifying their meanings, classifying their uses according to dates and cultural contexts, and drawing conclusions about the writing and the writers

subdisciplines.name: Numismatics
subdisciplines.description: The study or collection of currency, including coins, tokens, paper money, and related objects

subdisciplines.name: Palaeography
subdisciplines.description: The study of ancient handwriting; it involves deciphering, reading, and dating historical manuscripts
